title: Episode 38: Me, Me, Me
description: It doesn't take a psychologist to see narcissism in our culture of selfies. But we decided to talk to one anyway. Jean Twenge is a researcher and author of the books The Narcissism Epidemic, and Generation Me.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
